channel.title: Javascript on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Noetic Nought

item.title: Recurse Center, 2014-08-24
item.description: Friday I started playing around with React.js to see how I could build the GitHub organization dashboard, that I plan to. Saturday Got a horrendous idea of implementing a disqus-like commenting system using GitHub’s issue comments, and ran with it. It seems technically feasible based on some initial implementation. I need to clean-up/rewrite the prototype code on Monday. Sunday Spent the day with cousins at Central Park Zoo, Upper East Side River front.
